messages.title: Beware of Labour's lies and smears
messages.content: Only last year Gordon Brown's own spin doctor was forced to quit after his plans for an election smear campaign became public. Now with Labour more desperate than ever, voters are on their guard for more Labour lies and smears.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Remember the choice in many parts of Scotland is between the Liberal Democrats and Labour.

quotes.text: The Prime Minister's personal spin doctor Damian McBride quit after it emerged he...conspired to spread false and sinister stories of a highly personal nature.
Alistair Darling's aides 'used civil service for dirty tricks'

images.caption: BEWARE! Labour is growing more desperate by the day...

leaflet.additionalNotes: Only the Liberal Democrats will deliver real change and a fairer Scotland.
